item.title: Utkarsh Small Finance Bank Ltd Hits All-Time Low Amid Prolonged Downtrend
item.description: Utkarsh Small Finance Bank Ltd has reached a new all-time low of Rs.13.08, marking a significant decline amid sustained negative performance and underwhelming financial results over recent quarters. Time: 5 minutes ago

item.title: Waaree Energies Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Strong Market Momentum
item.description: Waaree Energies Ltd has witnessed a significant surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, coinciding with robust price gains and heightened market activity.
